alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 9:04PM EST until February 09 at 1:30AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent precipitation has caused the Green River to rise above flood stage at Paradise, and will remain above flood stage into early this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 383.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 384.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
